titles.title: To amend title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand access to high risk pools.
To amend title I of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand access to high risk pools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Amends the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to expand eligibility for the high risk health insurance pool program to include individuals who have been covered under a state health benefits risk pool during the six-month period prior to the date on which such individual is applying for coverage through the high risk pool.
